message.content:
{"id": "17423", "title": "Revert appears twice in the popup menu", "description": "There are two Revert options in the menu.", "OB": "When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, there is a Revert option before the FORMAT option and another Revert option after the UNDO option.", "EB": "When opening the popup menu in a Java editor, there should only be one Revert option before the FORMAT option, and it should be disabled. After making the editor dirty, the Revert option should still be disabled.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue:
1) Build F1.1
2) Open a Java editor
3) Make the editor dirty
4) Popup the menu"}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
